website_summaries.verdict: Great goggles with an easy-to-replace magnetic lens.
pros: These stylish goggles are comfortable and have no issues with fog
The magnetic removable lens is a great feature and stays in place even after rough wipeouts
Venting ports control airflow to prevent fogging
UV400 protection on outside of lens
cons: The lens may pop off if the goggles are picked up from the sides

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I am an old skier and I tried all kind of goggles. Up until now, the best I had was a pair of Smith Turbo Regulator with a built in electric fan that prevented fogging. These Fuel Optics are by far better goggles, the vision is superb, they don't fog and the magnetic lens is an excellent idea. I highly recommend them. I liked them so much that I bough another pair for my grandson. The only suggestion I have for the manufacturer is to add a quick release buckle on the strap so that you can remove them quickly, especially when you have a GoPro camera attached to the ski helmet..
customer_reviews.author: Roberto M. Pensotti

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Value!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two pair of these goggles for a Spring Break snowboarding trip with my son. They arrived in a timely manner and appeared to be great quality. After using them on the slopes for three days, I have to say that we were very impressed. My son loved the look and feel of the goggles. More than that, I was impressed with the performance. The goggles have a wide range of vision and NEVER fogged on me. I would highly recommend these goggles to the beginner as well as the advanced skiier / snowboarder.
customer_reviews.author: paradise

customer_reviews.title: WOW! AMAZING! What a difference.
customer_reviews.text: Just barely got these and WOW! These are replacing some 12 year old+ Scott goggles and the difference is just incredible. Light weight, comfortable but the most amazing thing is how clear they are and the glare reduction. Bright and sunny here in Vermont today with fresh snow from the recent big storm so glare is pretty high, but put these goggles on and it just disappears and everything is so much clearer. Both my wife and son tried them on and the same reaction, "WOW, that's amazing." Will give them a good test tomorrow on a mountain hike so will follow up on this review.
customer_reviews.author: Arnold P. Lillie

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Money, Lens Prone to Scratch
customer_reviews.text: These are some of the best Snowboarding goggles out there. Very good viability in them and they don't fog up. They also look really good and are great for either sunny days or cloudy. But I can't give it 5 stars because the lens is very prone to be scratched. I know that this is more cosmetic and doesn't really effect its performance. But still, I have had $15 sunglasses that have held up better than this lens.
customer_reviews.author: Vlad Packer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Goggles!
customer_reviews.text: First, I have not worn goggles skiing for 30 years. (I usually where sunglasses) Needed goggles for a ski trip to Jackson Hole. The weather was forecasted to be cold and snowy. Checked some reviews and bought the Fuel Optics. Price was right. The goggles were fantastic. I wore them for 1 day of blizzard conditions and 1 day of sunny conditions. I was very impressed. Worked great in both conditions. I did have some very slight foggy going up the lift, but I was huffing and puffing after some serious skiing. Never completely fogged up and always were clear by the time we reached the top. These goggles should last me the next 30 years.
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: ... simply because I have not used them and would like to be able to provide an update after first ...
customer_reviews.text: For now I am giving a four star simply because I have not used them and would like to be able to provide an update after first use. As far as initial observation, I find they are exactly as described. Look great and fit as expected. The material appears to be quality made and doesn't feel like they will fall apart. If you are looking for an inexpensive product to suit your snowy hobby I would reccomend these based on initial observation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressed with the quality of these goggles
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a pair of these based on the great product reviews and I have to say I'm really impressed with the quality of these. I've compared them to $200 pairs of Oakleys and can see no real difference. The strap is comfortable and easily adjustable, yet also stays in place. The lens is optically correct and has no distortion. I really dig the gold tint as well. Unfortunately, just after I bought these, they were stolen...by my wife. So I happily ordered a second pair for myself. Don't waste your money on expensive goggles just for the name recognition. These are legit and totally worth it. Amazing value/quality.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Fuel Optics, you amaze me.
customer_reviews.text: These goggles go above and beyond what I expected. I have worn the goggles on two different mountains: Shasta, CA and at Sugar Bowl in Norden. On both occasions these goggles have provided amazing clarity without any fogging, and properly protected my eyes from the sun. Another plus, is the look of these goggles. They are pretty sweet! I recommend these goggles to any skier or snowboarder who wishes to look groovy on the slopes without breaking their bank. These goggles are worth every penny and more!
customer_reviews.author: Rob Carnahan

customer_reviews.title: These are excellent and lookngreat
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent and lookngreat. Do not fog and have a great strap. The magnetic lens is great (it did pop off when a friend borrowing them crashed) but so far stayed on for me. I did buy the red lens too and it is preferable to me as it lets more light in. Cons: the blue lens looks the coolest but red is better. They dont have a clear night lens, none of these are light enough for skiing under lights.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Bokeh

customer_reviews.title: awesome goggle system.
customer_reviews.text: These are a really great lens to use with the goggles on moderate light days. My biggest thing with these, are the magnetic lens. It makes swapping lenses so easy. I used to have to change my entire goggle to achieve what these do in a pop. Really enjoy these goggles, and the quality is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Azboarder23

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Fits perfectly around my Giro helmet and ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Fits perfectly around my Giro helmet and excellent fov. Had a small issue and customer service department handled it like professionals and made the entire experience better than expected. Thank you for a great product and overall experience.
customer_reviews.author: Lasercomp

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic value. Everyone was jealous of my goggles
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic value. Everyone was jealous of my goggles, especially the magnetic frames. I didn't see the fuss about that particular feature but its cool for sure and stayed attached through some nasty wipeouts. They defogged almost instantly. My friends all had $150-$250 goggles and all said they'd go this route next time...I can't recommend highly enough. I got the black lenses, not as dark as picture would indicate. Did some night boarding and they were not ideal but fine. For $45 just buy these
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Richardson

customer_reviews.title: These glasses look awesome feel awesome but they are not worth it
customer_reviews.text: These glasses look awesome feel awesome but they are not worth it. The water gets trapped between the outter and inner lens and if its cold its freezes in there. Even if it's not that cold it just stays foggy and there is nothing you can do about it since its between the 2 lenses. I should also mention this happened 15 minutes into the first run on the first day I wore them. Maybe its just my lens but I don't know. Steer clear for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great Ski Goggles
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the quality of the product. I was a bit skeptical in the beginning about this 'unheard-of' company. But I decided to take the plunge and try their goggles. The build quality is great and the skis came in good condition - without any scratches etc. I chose the gray version as I have very sensitive eyes and they work well. It's ergonomics is also pretty neat and even with helmet it sits well on the face. Overall, I would recommend this goggle even though it's by no means a cheap one.
customer_reviews.author: VM

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, minor issues
customer_reviews.text: Wore these for the first time today and i loved them. They look awesome and did great in low light. Never had any issues with them digging up either. The only issues i noticed was some water leaked in from the top air vents (rained a bit) and When i wiped it up i noticed how easily the lense scratches. Overall, these are great for their price.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon S.

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars, awesome buy!
customer_reviews.text: Novice snowboarder in training but I bought these for my weekend at snowshoe and added 2 other lenses. -comfortable with no fogging -easy switch out with magnetic lenses -awesome field of view -cost 1/3 what the Oakley ones would have and I get a military discount with Oakley I research for days before I buy anything, I couldn't be happier with this decision. These are awesome so if you're going to buy, get these!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Delano

customer_reviews.title: The magnetic lens attachment is brilliant, very simple to change out lens' when necessary
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product in every way. The magnetic lens attachment is brilliant, very simple to change out lens' when necessary. Quality and fit is equal to goggles costing five times the price. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: A&TW

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles
customer_reviews.text: I bought these goggles for my son and he loves them they don't fog up very much only when you really try to breathe into them and they look great on his face the strap if very comfortable if you wear it without a helmet and fits perfectly on the helmet if you do wear one. I really like the interchangeable feature and I plan on buying one of the two other lenses available. The lenses can be changed easily but do not fall out even in a hard crash. I highly recommend this to anyone that wants great goggles without the crazy price tag of big brand models like Oakleys or Smith.
customer_reviews.author: Mayur Raichura

customer_reviews.title: Afffordable
customer_reviews.text: Used these during two days of snowy conditions out west. They work as expected, comfortable, did not fog, let in adequate light even in snowy conditions. Water droplet found its way in between the lenses so that was kind of annoying.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonDude

customer_reviews.title: Awesome til the dual pane lense seal broke
customer_reviews.text: These things made it through about 10 snow trips before they started fogging up real bad. After investigation I noticed that the seal between the 2 panes of lenses had broken and that was allowing moisture between them and fogging the goggles up pretty bad. So much so to the point where I rode down the mountain without them on because I couldn’t see. They worked amazing until this happened though!
customer_reviews.author: Drew Bacha

customer_reviews.title: Everything about these goggles are great. Not too impressed by the lens
customer_reviews.text: Everything about these goggles are great. Not too impressed by the lens, it’s more for show. Great goggles for the price.
customer_reviews.author: p

customer_reviews.title: Blue Paints chipping off frame! They fog up more then I expected
customer_reviews.text: Awesome looking goggles and comfortable! The bad thing is they keep fogging up on me and the blue paints already chipping off the frame piece that connects to the strap! maybe I have a faulty pair cause I have only used them 3 times and have the problems listed
customer_reviews.author: Loran

customer_reviews.title: Good but big for small faces
customer_reviews.text: In full disclosure, I did return these simply cuz they were a little too big for my face. I can get away with wearing a juniors size or even a medium fit. But the product itself seems great! I wish they just fit my face better.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Tahoe blizzard-tested
customer_reviews.text: Picked these up a few weeks ago because my old goggles were toast and these looked like a good value. I figured that at that price, I was taking a chance on them. Anyway, finally had a chance to test out my Fuel goggles in a heavy Tahoe snowstorm last weekend, and I came away very impressed. These are terrific. Amazing visibility, no fog, and the smooth surface makes it much easier to wipe away accumulated snow. Oh, and they look great too. Heartily recommended.
customer_reviews.author: TelstarLogistics

customer_reviews.title: Great Goggles
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, I received the googles, the packaging seemed to be in order, it came with a microfiber bag for protection and cleaning. The goggles had a big strap, great for over the helmet. I have not used these on a mountain yet, however the dual-pane lens looks great. The magnets holding the lens to the frame seemed strong and I doubt I will any issue with the lens falling out. I hope the anti-fog tech will work, I will post an update but so far these seems to be a great goggle for such a great price! I would recommend to anyone with a budget that isn't willing to compromise for cheap junk.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Szakacs

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing value for the money. I’ve had several different googles over the years and these are by far my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Great value! No fogging.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product!! Wore it for 2 full days in overcast, snowy conditions and had no issues with fogging. The product looks more expensive then it was, which is a plus. They are hard to adjust the band but fit perfectly over a helmet. Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Kru

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with performance
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as an extra lens for the blue goggles. Ended up wearing only this lens, as the weekend in Mammoth had a mix of sunshine, overcast, and sleet. Worked great in all conditions and light. Good contrast in overcast conditions and didn't fog up all weekend. so far very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: SB-Rider

customer_reviews.title: I loved them, and so did other people I met ...
customer_reviews.text: I got these for a snowboarding trip last weekend. I loved them, and so did other people I met while on the lift. Not only were they stylish, they also didnt fog up once. I'm not the greatest at boarding so I eat it a couple of times here and there... From rolling in the snow, taking them on and off, and face planting once or twice, these held up. The lens didn't pop off, they were secure and very breathable.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Approved!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product, great value, fits well, no fog at all, looks fantastic, magnetic lenses are awesome, super easy to change them as well! Very recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Felipe

customer_reviews.title: Great Goggles!
customer_reviews.text: First pair of snowboard/ski goggles I bought on Amazon that actually don't fog up. Loved using these on the mountains this past winter season, interchangeable lens is an awesome feature. Magnets are strong, lens has never popped out when I wiped out etc.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Good Clarity, no fogging.
customer_reviews.text: I like the clarity of the lens, and it did a good job at not fogging up. I did drop them once and they seemed to scratch easily although probably any other goggle would be the same. They are comfortable. I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: integrity automotive

customer_reviews.title: and they are good goggles. The all black fuel optics goggles that ...
customer_reviews.text: I own two pair of Zionor goggles, purchased from Amazon, and they are good goggles. The all black fuel optics goggles that I purhased are better IMO! Better overall fit, easy removable lens, and better logo/design on strap. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BMR

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this lens for normal daytime skiing. Super clear with little to no fogging.
customer_reviews.author: Niki

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this extra lens for the fuel optics goggles I bought last year. Great value for the money. The lens pops out easier than I could have imagined, but not easy enough to have it happen on accident. The original black lens can be tough to see out of on a cloudy day.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin L

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality and cheap
customer_reviews.text: High quality, magnets work awesome, and I like goggles that you cannot see your eyes from the outside. They are very tinted to where you can see out but your eyes are not visible. AND CHEAP!!!
customer_reviews.author: Zaki1166

customer_reviews.title: The goggles arrived yesterday and they look even better in person than online
customer_reviews.text: The goggles arrived yesterday and they look even better in person than online. This is my first pair of spherical goggles and the peripheral vision is amazing. I bought these after trying a friend's pair of Anon goggles. I was ready to splurge for Anon and then I came across the FuelOptics product. For a fraction of the cost you get a pair of goggles that I couldn't tell the difference from the other brands. The lens is incredibly clear and if offers great tint. I have yet to ski in the goggles so I can't comment on fogging, but based on the other reviews I feel confident the fog protection will be great.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Janczura

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really good pair of goggles for snowboarding. Should have got the yellow lens though for cloudy days.
customer_reviews.author: LL2000

customer_reviews.title: Good googles
customer_reviews.text: Sweet googles. And the best part, and the reason I picked them up, was the ability to swap the lenses out quickly and easily. This will allow me to look different over the season instead of the same old googles every picture! They fit great. And are well worth it at the price point!
customer_reviews.author: T. Clark

customer_reviews.title: When we would move to a new location the water rolled right off and my vision was excellent. There were no fogging issues either
customer_reviews.text: I wore these while fishing a bass tournament in the pouring rain. When we would move to a new location the water rolled right off and my vision was excellent. There were no fogging issues either. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the googles
customer_reviews.text: I like the googles. Have not worn them out on the show yet. Lens is clear and crisp, magnets are strong and dis-attach easily.
customer_reviews.author: Oleg G.

customer_reviews.title: Great Goggles!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a cheap pair to use just for an extra set tried them out and excellent pair of goggles clear to see through. Magnets are super strong removing the lens and putting new one on is effortless as soon as its close it grabs itselff n snaps in place Super sick! All around very pleased with these goggles! Could use a few more color options for extra lenses though.
customer_reviews.author: Aklemp

customer_reviews.title: The optics are great. They don't fog up even on snowy
customer_reviews.text: The red lens is adequate even for the brightest of days. The optics are great. They don't fog up even on snowy, foggy days. My only complaint is the limited field of view caused by the large frame.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Bade

customer_reviews.title: They worked amazing no fogging and the purple tint worked great on ...
customer_reviews.text: They worked amazing no fogging and the purple tint worked great on the cloudy and sunny days we had while snowboarding. Took a bad fall and the lens stayed in and no scratches either.
customer_reviews.author: Jordyn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my nephew, a budding snowboarder, for Christmas. He loves it, especially the magnetic changeable lens feature.
customer_reviews.author: Timmy

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate when buying!
customer_reviews.text: Great goggles! I've used a variety of brands such as smith and spy and the build quality of these is just as good. Magnetic lens systems with other goggles will run you $200+, so I was pretty pumped to find these. The magnets are strong and the lenses are super easy to replace. They perform well on the slopes and I've received many compliments on them. Wouldn't hesitate to buy a second pair. Thinking about getting the black lenses
customer_reviews.author: Oscar A Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Love these goggles
customer_reviews.text: Love these goggles. Nice comfortable fit with easy to adjust strap. Was a little apprehensive about how easily the "quick change lens" could pop off, but they are securely attached. I'm confident that they won't pop off by accident.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie O

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Goggles work as described and as expected based on other customer reviews. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and great protection for several long days skiing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No fog, increased visibility.
customer_reviews.text: Very solid product, used them in Keystone during a cold and windy day. The ventilation was excellent and not a single sign of fog even with a gator, this typically caused my old goggles to fog up.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Bergeron

customer_reviews.title: Amazing ski or snowboard goggles.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing ski or snowboard goggles. Great quality on the goggles. I had the opportunity to try them on a 2-day snowboard trip and they performed great in sunny and partially cloudy atmospheres, they never fogged and kept my face warm. The magnetic frame if great to easily change the lenses and very resistant to hard falls. Also, great customer service from Fuel Optics.
customer_reviews.author: ARMANDO GONZALEZ

customer_reviews.title: Best goggles I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: The best pair of goggles I've ever owned in twenty years! They were the only pair that fit with my helmet. The blue color lenses work well in both susan and even in flat light conditions. Would strongly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: jason ireson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are just what we were looking for. Can't wait to try them out.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey R. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Fits nice, looks great
customer_reviews.text: Fits nice,looks great, and I can't wait to wear them on the slopes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: But a pair in every color
customer_reviews.text: Will be buying another pair, zero dog, very comfortable and Great color! Compared to my friends Oakley’s he was skiing with and I enjoyed mike more, and the price was unbeatable
customer_reviews.author: Steven Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Fits nice and wide view
customer_reviews.text: Good price. Good fit. Wide view angle. Lens is easy to remove , but is secure on the goggle. Not tested on slopes yet. Looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Big J

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable. Trick magnetic lens very cool
customer_reviews.text: Awsome googles, skied all day zero fog up. Very comfortable. Trick magnetic lens very cool. Fit ski helmet very well.
customer_reviews.author: blaster130

customer_reviews.title: Very nice pair of goggles!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use for 4wheeling, they are a very good looking pair of goggles and extremely easy to change out the lens with the magnetic lens system. Unfortunately they wont work with my glasses, but they do however work with my wife's smaller frame glasses and she was more then happy to claim them lol Although I am bummed out they didn't work for me, there still a top notch pair of goggles.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Garland

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit with my helmet
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit with my helmet, and the lenses are easy to change out. Can't wait to hit the mountain and test them out.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Ottley

customer_reviews.title: Superior
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with these goggles. Over all appearance is superior. Fitment, ventilation and vision is fantastic. Compared to other goggles on the market I feel I have more peripheral vision with these, than others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! Arrived in great shape and seem very nicely ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Arrived in great shape and seem very nicely crafted. I really like the easy of swapping out the different lenses.
customer_reviews.author: The Book World

customer_reviews.title: great price
customer_reviews.text: didnt fog up and fit was great without being too bulky
customer_reviews.author: nat

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Googles!
customer_reviews.text: Very well constructed and stylish to boot! I opted to get both the black and blue lenses- quick and smooth transition for changing! The black lense is amazing- very dark. The blue is perfect for all types of lighting. I will be the envy of all my friends come ski season!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Blue is for you!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite goggles so far! Lots of compliments for the fresh mirror blue lens, full lens makes the snow easy to clean off especially with the magnetic feature on lens just in case they fog but they rarely do. Thank you Fuel Optics for this high quality affordable product!
customer_reviews.author: Alen

customer_reviews.title: These goggles rule
customer_reviews.text: Spend more days on mountain than not in the winter for 25+ years. These goggles are the best I have had in all those years. Can't beat the price! Super stoked!
customer_reviews.author: Waxstax

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for boarding
customer_reviews.text: Really great goggles for the price and look stunning. Also really durable and the magnetic visor function is great to switch lenses and to clear snow out of the inside if they fall off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best goggles for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of goggles! Can't wait to use them on the hill this winter. Easily adjusts to fit your head or a helmet. Would recommend them to anyone looking for HD lens quality without breaking the bank.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Hougard

customer_reviews.title: look great and lenses snap on and off simply and easily
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased. Looking forward to using them, look great and lenses snap on and off simply and easily. Very comfortable also.
customer_reviews.author: K$

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good goggles at a great price. easy to change magnetic lens for different snow conditions
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!! Great Value!!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend these snowboard goggles. Perfect fit and it’s awesome how easy the lense is to change out. Will definitely buy these type again!!
customer_reviews.author: Josh R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, just like the ones that cost like quadruple the price! Can't wait to try out this season.
customer_reviews.author: Moune

customer_reviews.title: I received these and were exactly what I was expecting ...
customer_reviews.text: I received these and were exactly what I was expecting from the product information provided. I can't wait to hit the slopes in three weeks!
customer_reviews.author: Albert P Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles!
customer_reviews.text: High quality goggles for a great price! I am truly impressed. Don't waste your money on Oakley. These look great and have a high end finish.
customer_reviews.author: daveytalls

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to change lense
customer_reviews.text: I've been using oakley goggle many years and this is better than oakley goggle. Its much easier to change lense!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kyung Hyun Choi

customer_reviews.title: Great looking goggles
customer_reviews.text: Great looking goggles. I wore them twice so far this season. Did not fall off after I fell on the slopes. Fits really well with any helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C

customer_reviews.title: Goggles are great for all conditions - RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.text: Goggles are great for all conditions - Recently used on my three day ski trip and had Sunny, Rainy and white out conditions. Used an anti fogger first and had absolutely no issues. Would recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: Larry J.

customer_reviews.title: Goggles are perfect. The pictures cannot capture the vibrant colors on ...
customer_reviews.text: Goggles are perfect. The pictures cannot capture the vibrant colors on the goggles which look amazing up close. They are extremely comfortable and easy to see through. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: T.J. Shah

customer_reviews.title: Very Cool
customer_reviews.text: Came in exactly as described. High quality straps. I'm going to look so cool on the slopes!
customer_reviews.author: CCM

customer_reviews.title: These are very cool goggles. The lens is large and provides an ...
customer_reviews.text: These are very cool goggles. The lens is large and provides an unobstructed view of the world. Another awesome feature is the magnetic lens. The lens snaps onto the frame via powerful magnets (the lens will not come off by accident because the magnets are way to powerful for that to happen). It's a great idea because now I can easily change lens when they become scratched (which always happens eventually). The goggles are also very comfortable, unlike the pair of Bolle I previously owned. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: ripcurldog

customer_reviews.title: Killer goggles!
customer_reviews.text: We bought two pair of goggles for snowboarding. They're fantastic! Optimal coverage & we can even spot each other from a distance by just our goggles! They rock!
customer_reviews.author: ashnty

customer_reviews.title: I haven't used them yet but they look great and fit very comfortably on my face
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used them yet but they look great and fit very comfortably on my face. I got the ones with the blue/purple lenses. The fame around the side is a metallic dark blue. Can't wait to try them on the mountain:)
customer_reviews.author: Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Received my goggles on time and they were great. Ive always worn "expensive" goggles in the past ...
customer_reviews.text: Received my goggles on time and they were great. Ive always worn "expensive" goggles in the past and didn't know how these would compare. They were great. Worked well and looked good. and for a quarter of the price!
customer_reviews.author: TONE

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Been great so far. Haven't fogged up while out on the snowmobile.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good ---- 3 days extreme snowmobiling in WY. this Feb. they were 100% effective
customer_reviews.author: Bill BEaury

customer_reviews.title: Great value for your hard earned money!
customer_reviews.text: Just got back from spring skiing in Colorado. Loved this product and the ease of changing lenses couldn't be easier
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Cool goggles for the price. Wiped out pretty good and the lenses popped out. this was the only incident i had, but i like them so much that its not a big deal. They're comfy and clear. Considering buying the extra lenses just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos OrtizTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Love these goggles!
customer_reviews.text: These goggles are amazing! They have the quality and look of the brands that cost $200 +! Since it is August, I have not had the opportunity to wear them on the mountain, but I wore them around the house for an hour while I did my chores. Not only were they super comfortable, they did not go up once, and my body runs really hot!
customer_reviews.author: Jason R.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: They feel great and look good. Because they're so thick they cut out some of your peripheral vision though. Takes some getting used to. The magnetic lens is strong enough to stay on even after tough falls.
customer_reviews.author: alexander

customer_reviews.title: 1st timer in Colorado
customer_reviews.text: It was my first time going to Colorado snowboarding, so I ordered these for the trip. Ordered the blue ones and they looked great from the start. When these arrived it only naturally amped me up more for the trip. Now to Colorado... well, I am not a professional snowboarder so falling was something I was prepared to do some of. The magnetic lens was a concern during these happenings but they never fell out of position (regardless of how wicked the fall may have been). Goggles never fogged up and were comfortable to wear all day. These goggles are practical gear that looks good for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, style and quality. Excited to hit the slopes.
customer_reviews.author: C R DENNIS MD

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: looks good but bad lenses. blurry vision. Not nearly as good as my old ones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and sick looks
customer_reviews.text: Great optics upon receiving them. Arrived just in time for my trip to the Austrian alps. I have high hopes for these great looking goggles
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected!! REALLY COOL
customer_reviews.text: They look great and they feel great can't wait to hit the slopes with these
customer_reviews.author: Horacio C.

customer_reviews.title: Solid goggles at a reasonable cost
customer_reviews.text: I have not had the pleasure of taking these out in the mountain yet, however these goggles feel like they are high end, without the high end cost! Materials seem strong and sturdy, the magnetic lens is a great feature! I hope to get more lenses in the future after I see how these truly act on the mountain!
customer_reviews.author: Cody London

customer_reviews.title: These googles are awesome! Great deal and great performance
customer_reviews.text: These googles are awesome! Great deal and great performance. Highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles! Stylish and functional!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent goggles for the money. The magnets hold very well and I had no issues with them popping out accidentally. Very stylish and functional. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Cross

customer_reviews.title: Great winter goggles,
customer_reviews.text: Great goggles! high quality with a strong elastic band. nice option of changing out lenses in changing light conditions and easy to clean off snow and water.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Herndon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: The goggles are amazing and the magnetic lenses are perfect!!! They came on time and they look super sweet!
customer_reviews.author: Kelli D.

customer_reviews.title: GNARLY dude
customer_reviews.text: These are great looking gogggles with great periphery view. They only fogged up on me once because i took a beginner snowboarder class and most of the class was standing around and some gliding with the board. So they fogged up cause there was no air flowing through the goggles. Once i hit greens and blues there was no fogging at all cause there was air flowing through them. I’ll use them again on my next trip. Also there is a thin plastic film inside the goggles. Pull that off. I didnt see it and had to pull it off while on the mountain.
customer_reviews.author: Emilio M.

customer_reviews.title: These googles did pretty great! I'm a female with a pretty average ...
customer_reviews.text: These googles did pretty great! I'm a female with a pretty average sized face (or at least I like to think so) and I thought they were slightly too big on my face, but they ended up working just fine. They were great for the conditions I was in- there was mostly sunny skies so the lenses were great. They did tend to fog up a bit on the inside, but after I put them up on my helmet while I was on the lift to air out, the fog was gone and I didn't see much more fog the rest of the time.
customer_reviews.author: JB

product_meta.title: Fuel Optics High Performance Anit-Fog Ski and Snowboard Goggles with Magnetic Quick Change Lens | Helmet Compatible with Extra Long Adjustable Stra
product_meta.description:
Fuel Optics High-Performance Ski and Snowboard Googles 

Fuel Optics snow goggles are a great value, offering both superior quality with cutting edge design. Our Backdraft series dual-lens goggle featured with anti-fog, anti-wind and 100% UV protection to protect your eyes when skiing, snowboarding, snowmobiling and other winter sports. The "frameless" design offers great panoramic vision and clean sight for all the way down from hill, while the magnetic interchangeable lens system makes swapping out the lenses a breeze. The backdraft series ski and snowboard goggles come with adjustable extra-long head strap which compatible with helmet and different head size for both men and women.

Key Features  *  Helmet Compatible with Extra long, Adjustable strap
 * Removable Lens
 * Well ventilated system at the top and bottom of goggles
 * Thick Padding for Maximum Comfort
 * Distortion Free Vision
 * Comfortably Fits Over Most Glasses
 * Magnetic Quick-Change Lens
feature_bullets: MAGNETIC LENS CHANGING TECHNOLOGY: Ultra-wide spherical frameless design. Magnetic quick lens change system for quick and easy lens replacement and cleaning.
ULTRA WIDE FRAMELESS DESIGN: Features 100% UV400 protection with triple layer foam for increased comfort and improved moisture management.

CLOUD9 ANTI-FOG TECHNOLOGY: Dual-pane lenses create a thermal barrier designed to reduce fogging and optimize flow of air over inside of lens. Venting ports also aid in controlling airflow, while preventing clogging from snow and ice.
HELMET COMPATIBLE STRAP: Adjustable head strap is compatible with most helmets and different head sizes for both men and women.

SPHERICAL ULTRA CLEAR LENS: Advanced lens technology for excellent optical clarity and fog-free performance. VX-Vison outer lenses feature a unique coating to help prevent scratches, while ensuring distortion free vision.
